summary.Title: Cyber Security Developer
summary.Presentation: Are you ready to join TERMA’s Radar team and drive cyber security as part of our solutions within a market leading global company? Are you motivated by developing and supporting complex mis

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you ready to join TERMA’s Radar team and drive cyber security as part of our solutions within a market leading global company? Are you motivated by developing and supporting complex mission critical radar systems solutions? Then they got the right job for you!

 

Terma A/S is a high-tech and innovative international company that delivers advanced technologies to keep people safe, both in peacetimes and in times of conflict. Terma’s systems provide security for people on land, at sea, and in the air.

 

Terma is leading in the global market within their niches, which includes state-of-the-art technologies for aerospace, Joint Strike Fighter, advanced self-protection systems, and radar systems for vessel traffic services and coastal surveillance.

 

Across the business areas Terma’s customers are focusing on cyber security as a key enabler for success of our solutions and systems. As a Cyber Security Developer, you will deploy your cyber security expert knowledge across the Radar organization to provide agile, responsive cyber security support to meet customer’s needs. You will be cyber security operations responsible assisting the Radar organization through a diversity of projects and products towards meeting current and future cyber security expectations from Terma’s customers.


The role and your most important tasks

You will be the anchor point of bringing your cyber security skills to bear across a wide array of projects and in various stages of the project lifecycle - from proposal to maintenance, learning and leveraging a breadth of skill sets. Security engineering, security architecture, vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, incident response, authorization, and accreditation as well as embedded cyber security are all countermeasures that you will be dealing with in close collaboration with sales, product management, systems -, hardware - and software engineering teams.


Your primary areas of responsibility are:

  • Integrating Customer Security Requirements in the products

  • Identifying vulnerabilities in existing systems/products and assist with eliminating/reducing their impact

  • Designing and implementing Security Controls and integration into the products/systems

  • Assisting Terma’s development teams to follow secure product development lifecycle

  • Assisting product management in early gate activities including technology road mapping

  • Response on day-to-day requests as the security subject matter expert
  • Participation in conferences, workshops and customer meetings


Your experience and education:

  • You bring a relevant education, i.e., Master’s degree in engineering, computer science with cyber security as specialization or similar

  • You are a subject matter expert in various information security disciplines like cryptographs and design-based security solutions

  • You possess a high understanding of systems engineering, architecture, development, design principles and experience in embedded, large software systems and/or defense systems

  • You are used to produce system specifications and can carry through the technical solution according to these specifications, from the initial idea until end-of-life of the product

  • Software development based on JAVA, C++, C in a Linux environment
  • DevOps tools & Linux
  • Test

  • You thrive in an environment with independent and overall responsibility for the technical part of a development project

 

You as a person

With your strong skills, personality, and drive, you are able to win respect across Terma’s organization. You master stakeholder management and with your communication skills and your focus on ensuring the right solutions, you navigate naturally around a cross-disciplinary environment where solutions and deliveries are the result of effective collaboration.

 

Furthermore, you are curious by nature and have a willingness to learn. Lastly, you are a team player who makes the team achieve its goals with a good attitude and a sense of humour in your approach.

What does Terma offer you?

First of all, you will join an international and well-reputed organization working within a highly specialized and unique domain. 

 

Secondly, you will spend your day with highly professional and inspiring coworkers who share a good sense of humor.

 

Finally, Terma offer competitive employment conditions and good development opportunities both professionally and personally – with room for your private life. But if you want to, you can also join Terma’s social activities such as fitness and sports or participate in conferences and events.


Do you want to know more?

The high-tech and innovative Terma Group develops products and systems for defense, non-defense and security applications, including command and control systems, radar systems, self-protection systems for aircraft and vessels, space technology, and aerostructures for the aircraft industry.

 

Terma A/S is headquartered at Aarhus, Denmark. Internationally, Terma has subsidiaries and operations in The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, United Kingdom, United Arab Emirates, India, Singapore and the U.S.

Interested?

The recruitment process is handled by mpeople on behalf of Terma. If you have any questions about the position or Terma, please get in touch with Birgitte Vilsgaard on bgv@mpeople.dk or +45 28 18 18 91

We look forward to hearing from you.

#jobsforukraine
